class project_tab.ProjectTab(main, name)[source]

Bases: TabPage

A widget for managing projects: opening, creating, and validating project settings. Methods:

show_file_dialog(dialog_type, title, file_type_filter='')[source]

Show a file or directory dialog based on the dialog_type.

Parameters:

  • dialog_type (str) – Type of dialog (“open_file”, “recent_file”, “directory”).

  • title (str) – Title of the dialog.

  • file_type_filter (str) – Filter for file types.

Returns:

The selected file or directory path, or None if cancelled.

Return type:

str

project_tab.app_files_path(filename)[source]

Determine the platform-appropriate path for app files.

project_tab.create_file_from_resource(resource_name, target_path, replace_text=None, new_text=None)[source]

Create a file from a resource template, optionally replacing text.

Parameters:

  • resource_name (str) – The name of the resource to read.

  • target_path (str) – The path where the file should be created.

  • replace_text (str, optional) – The text to be replaced in the resource.

  • new_text (str, optional) – The text to replace replace_text with.

project_tab.script_available(script_name)[source]

Check if a script file is available on the user’s PATH.

Parameters:

script_name (str) – Name of the script file.

Returns:

True if the script is available, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

Set the file’s modification and access time to the current time.

Parameters:

filename (str) – Path to the file.
